title: Hell's Kitchen Flea Market
seo_description: Get an authentic New York City experience at the Hell's Kitchen Flea Market.
location: West 39th Street & Ninth Avenue, New York, NY
short_description: Find anything from handmade jewelry to carefully crafted handbags, even some tasty treats along the way - the Hell's Kitchen Flea Market is the best way to find it all in one place.
more_content: Every Saturday and Sunday from 9 AM to 5 PM enjoy delicious foods, maybe find your next favorite t-shirt, or poke around just to see what fun arts & crafts vendors bring to the Hell's Kitchen Flea Market.
